gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.esb.client
Interface MessageBroadcastService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CaaersCaXchangeMessageBroadcastServiceImpl, CaaersNonGridCaXchangeMessageBroadcastServiceImpl
public interface MessageBroadcastService

This is the base interface, to send messages to external resources from caAERS.

Author:
Sujith Vellat Thayyilthodi, Biju Joseph
